item.title: Story Teaser: Flavors of the World | Genshin Impact
item.description: The passing of time is marked by meals as we drink and make merry, blessed by nature's grace. From past to present, the years go by in the blink of an eye. Smoke of hearths brings us joy and domesticity paints a picture of everyday life. Delicate clouds chase the moon as the boat floats on the river of time.
item.content:encoded:
The passing of time is marked by meals as we drink and make merry, blessed by nature's grace. From past to present, the years go by in the blink of an eye. Smoke of hearths brings us joy and domesticity paints a picture of everyday life. Delicate clouds chase the moon as the boat floats on the river of time.

Read more on Story Teaser: Flavors of the World | Genshin Impact

item.title: "Labyrinth Warriors" Event: Take part to invite "Blazing Riff" Xinyan (Pyro)!
item.description: During the event, you can obtain Aged Tokens upon completing the Mystic Onmyou Chamber. Aged Tokens can be exchanged in the event shop for Primogems, Crown of Insight, Character Level-Up Materials, Talent Level-Up Materials, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora. If you meet all the requirements for Blazing Unison, you can exchange a number of Aged Tokens to invite "Blazing Riff" Xinyan (Pyro).
item.content:encoded:
During the event, you can obtain Aged Tokens upon completing the Mystic Onmyou Chamber. Aged Tokens can be exchanged in the event shop for Primogems, Crown of Insight, Character Level-Up Materials, Talent Level-Up Materials, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora. If you meet all the requirements for Blazing Unison, you can exchange a number of Aged Tokens to invite "Blazing Riff" Xinyan (Pyro).

Read more on "Labyrinth Warriors" Event: Take part to invite "Blazing Riff" Xinyan (Pyro)!

item.description: The great gates of the bizarre and unpredictable Mystic Onmyou Chamber imprison fierce monsters within them. Venture deep into this Domain by yourself and conquer the many perils within, assisting Shiki Taishou to retrieve the fragments of his memories, and you will be able to explore the past that has been sealed within the Domain — and obtain its various treasures in the meantime.

item.title: System Maintenance Notice
item.description: The update to Version 2.3 will take place on November 24 at 06:00 a.m. (UTC+8). At the same time, routine maintenance of the internal accounts service system will also be carried out. Due to this, the Genshin Impact official website and in-game registration and payment features will be down temporarily. This maintenance will take approximately 40 minutes. We thank all Travelers for your patience and support.
item.content:encoded:
The update to Version 2.3 will take place on November 24 at 06:00 a.m. (UTC+8). At the same time, routine maintenance of the internal accounts service system will also be carried out. Due to this, the Genshin Impact official website and in-game registration and payment features will be down temporarily. This maintenance will take approximately 40 minutes. We thank all Travelers for your patience and support.

Read more on System Maintenance Notice

item.title: Notice of Temporary Suspension of Payment Channels
item.description: Starting from November 24 at 06:00 a.m. (UTC+8), we will carry out maintenance and adjustments on our internal payment platform. During the maintenance, American Express and JCB payment channels will be temporarily unavailable on the official Genshin Impact website and in the game. Both payment channels will be available again after the maintenance is complete. Please refer to the payment channels on the official website and in-game. You can also follow us on our official social media accounts t

During the maintenance, American Express and JCB payment channels will be temporarily unavailable on the official Genshin Impact website and in the game. item.title: Character Teaser - "Shenhe: Lonesome Dream" | Genshin Impact
item.description: Since childhood, Shenhe has lived in seclusion in the mountains, studying under an adeptus and practicing diligently day by day. Occasionally, the leaves rustle, birds sing, and insects chirp, as if a new guest is visiting. But when she listened closely, the mountain seemed lonely and lush, and not even the wind made a sound. All was silent.

item.title: "How gently do the clouds and flowers sway, as dancing winds meander through the vales."
item.description: Today, we'd like to introduce you to the director and mainstay of the Yun-Han Opera Troupe — Yun Jin! While one can always get delicious delicacies or good storytelling as long as one knows where to look, Yun Jin's performance does not just await one there.

item.title: Genshin Impact EP - A Moment of Tranquility in the Eradication of Evil
item.description: Through thousands of calamities and adversities, the evil of lingering malice will be purged. While gazing at the flowing rivers and towering mountains, one can enjoy a moment of peace.

item.title: Character Demo - "Shenhe: Crane in the Wild" | Genshin Impact
item.description: Among the villagers who often traverse the mountains, there is a saying that goes like this: When walking in the mountains, one must keep your eyes and ears wide open at all times to stay vigilant against evil spirits. If you hear a mournful cry of cranes and feel a strong gust of wind wrapped in frost, it means that an exorcist or an adeptus is close by, slaying demons. If that happens, take a detour and nothing should happen to you.
item.content:encoded:
Among the villagers who often traverse the mountains, there is a saying that goes like this: When walking in the mountains, one must keep your eyes and ears wide open at all times to stay vigilant against evil spirits. If you hear a mournful cry of cranes and feel a strong gust of wind wrapped in frost, it means that an exorcist or an adeptus is close by, slaying demons. If that happens, take a detour and nothing should happen to you.

Read more on Character Demo - "Shenhe: Crane in the Wild" | Genshin Impact

item.title: Collected Miscellany - "Shenhe: Fluttering of Frosty Feathers" | Genshin Impact
item.description: When travelers set foot in Jueyun Karst, it is common for them to feel envious of the carefree wild cranes in the clouds. But what they don't know is that when the cranes go where the wind takes them, they are lost as to where this path leads.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: "Labyrinth Warriors" Event: Take part to invite "Blazing Riff" Xinyan (Pyro)!
item.description: During the event, you can obtain Aged Tokens upon completing the Mystic Onmyou Chamber. Aged Tokens can be exchanged in the event shop for Primogems, Crown of Insight, Character Level-Up Materials, Talent Level-Up Materials, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora. If you meet all the requirements for Blazing Unison, you can exchange a number of Aged Tokens to invite "Blazing Riff" Xinyan (Pyro).

item.description: The great gates of the bizarre and unpredictable Mystic Onmyou Chamber imprison fierce monsters within them. Venture deep into this Domain by yourself and conquer the many perils within, assisting Shiki Taishou to retrieve the fragments of his memories, and you will be able to explore the past that has been sealed within the Domain — and obtain its various treasures in the meantime.

item.title: System Maintenance Notice
item.description: The update to Version 2.3 will take place on November 24 at 06:00 a.m. (UTC+8). At the same time, routine maintenance of the internal accounts service system will also be carried out. Due to this, the Genshin Impact official website and in-game registration and payment features will be down temporarily. This maintenance will take approximately 40 minutes. We thank all Travelers for your patience and support.
item.content:encoded:
The update to Version 2.3 will take place on November 24 at 06:00 a.m. (UTC+8). At the same time, routine maintenance of the internal accounts service system will also be carried out. Due to this, the Genshin Impact official website and in-game registration and payment features will be down temporarily. This maintenance will take approximately 40 minutes. We thank all Travelers for your patience and support.

Read more on System Maintenance Notice

Collect Snowstrider Emblems and Mysterious Emblems to exchange for rewards such as event-exclusive Weapon Refinement Materials, Crown of Insight, Weapon Ascension Materials, Talent Level-Up Materials, Hero's Wit, Mora, and Mystic Enhancement Ore from the Event Shop.

item.title: Character Teaser - "Shenhe: Lonesome Dream" | Genshin Impact
item.description: Since childhood, Shenhe has lived in seclusion in the mountains, studying under an adeptus and practicing diligently day by day. Occasionally, the leaves rustle, birds sing, and insects chirp, as if a new guest is visiting. But when she listened closely, the mountain seemed lonely and lush, and not even the wind made a sound. All was silent.
item.content:encoded:
Since childhood, Shenhe has lived in seclusion in the mountains, studying under an adeptus and practicing diligently day by day. Occasionally, the leaves rustle, birds sing, and insects chirp, as if a new guest is visiting. But when she listened closely, the mountain seemed lonely and lush, and not even the wind made a sound. All was silent.

item.title: "How gently do the clouds and flowers sway, as dancing winds meander through the vales."
item.description: Today, we'd like to introduce you to the director and mainstay of the Yun-Han Opera Troupe — Yun Jin! While one can always get delicious delicacies or good storytelling as long as one knows where to look, Yun Jin's performance does not just await one there.
item.content:encoded:
Today, we'd like to introduce you to the director and mainstay of the Yun-Han Opera Troupe — Yun Jin! While one can always get delicious delicacies or good storytelling as long as one knows where to look, Yun Jin's performance does not just await one there.

Read more on "How gently do the clouds and flowers sway, as dancing winds meander through the vales."

item.title: Genshin Impact EP - A Moment of Tranquility in the Eradication of Evil
item.description: Through thousands of calamities and adversities, the evil of lingering malice will be purged. While gazing at the flowing rivers and towering mountains, one can enjoy a moment of peace.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Character Demo - "Shenhe: Crane in the Wild" | Genshin Impact
item.description: Among the villagers who often traverse the mountains, there is a saying that goes like this: When walking in the mountains, one must keep your eyes and ears wide open at all times to stay vigilant against evil spirits. If you hear a mournful cry of cranes and feel a strong gust of wind wrapped in frost, it means that an exorcist or an adeptus is close by, slaying demons. If that happens, take a detour and nothing should happen to you.

item.title: Collected Miscellany - "Shenhe: Fluttering of Frosty Feathers" | Genshin Impact
item.description: When travelers set foot in Jueyun Karst, it is common for them to feel envious of the carefree wild cranes in the clouds. But what they don't know is that when the cranes go where the wind takes them, they are lost as to where this path leads.

item.title: Collected Miscellany - "Yun Jin: Showstopper" | Genshin Impact
item.description: The people of Liyue love listening to Liyue opera, and the fans are always impressed by the singing and acting skills of the renowned opera singer Yun Jin. They are in awe at Yun Jin's graceful fights on stage, but do not know that her skills with the spear are real enough to defend against her foes.

item.description: A strange tale that tells of adeptal affinity, where things are no longer what they once were, save for the thousands of threads of sorrow. The opera sings about the feats of a heroine, with new lines added to the story, and told anew in many homes.
